title: If I don't pray Janazah on my aunt, am I right, She says there is no heaven or hell, etc
transcript: Rashad from the Philippines There is no Shaytan. Abu Bakr and Omar, the one who were criminals. Okay, so what's your question? I decided not to pray Janazah on her and not to make dua for her if she dies first, Insha Allah. Am I right? Yes, you're right. She's not a Muslim. Okay, thank you. Jazak Allah Khair. Barak Allah Feek. I will try and seek Allah's guidance to solve your problem once and for all, Bi'ithni Allah.
